name: Balloon Popping Simulator
description:
Note: This game is pretty short. Every 20 or 30 points leads to the next round!

(Faster balloons and spiky balloons)


Instructions:
Click to pop the balloons (You can also click and hold!)

Notes:
  • After each round, the speed of the balloons increases. If you reach round 3, you have to avoid the spiky balloons. Lose all 3 lives and you lose! 
  • This is the first project to have an extended stage! I plan on doing this for the rest of my projects.
  • There are some glitches in the game, like a balloon that doesn't move in the bottom at Round 3, and being able to pop a balloon when you have 0 lives, but I will fix those and alot more soon! Give me suggestions on what to make!
